events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position submitted by the candidate yesterday afternoon with all required documentation.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's background in software development and DevOps skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle the candidate's recruitment process to ensure a smooth experience.
The candidate completed an initial screening call discussing previous software engineering projects and familiarity with DevOps practices.
The candidate responded positively to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm for the technical interview phase.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for next Tuesday to cover software development and DevOps tooling expertise.
